summary.purpose: Utility functions for wrapping Firestore snapshot configurations with Web Worker processing.
summary.problem_solved: Provides wrappers to offload snapshot callback processing to Web Workers for improved performance and reduced main thread blocking.

external.name: firebase
external.why_used: Firestore snapshot types and configuration interfaces

exports.name: wrapConfigsWithWorker
exports.description_one_line: Wraps snapshot configurations to process callbacks via a Web Worker.

exports.name: wrapDocumentConfigsWithWorker
exports.description_one_line: Wraps document snapshot configurations to process callbacks via a Web Worker.

symbols.name: wrapConfigsWithWorker
symbols.description_one_line: Wraps snapshot configurations to process callbacks via a Web Worker.

params.name: runProcessor
params.description: Function to run the processor (usually the worker invocation).

returns.description: Wrapped configurations ready for Web Worker processing.

details.what_it_does: Wraps snapshot configurations to process synchronous callbacks via a Web Worker, allowing offloading of heavy processing tasks.

symbols.name: wrapDocumentConfigsWithWorker
symbols.description_one_line: Wraps document snapshot configurations to process callbacks via a Web Worker.

returns.description: Wrapped document configurations ready for Web Worker processing.

details.what_it_does: Wraps document snapshot configurations to process callbacks via a Web Worker, enabling async processing of Firestore document snapshots.
